memberdef.argsstring: (wxRichTextCommand *cmd, const wxString &name, wxRichTextCommandId id, wxRichTextBuffer *buffer, wxRichTextParagraphLayoutBox *container, wxRichTextCtrl *ctrl, bool ignoreFirstTime=false)
memberdef.name: wxRichTextAction

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para: buffer is the top-level buffer, while container is the object within which the action is taking place. In the simplest case, they are the same.

briefdescription.para: Performs the action.
Undoes the action.

memberdef.argsstring: (long caretPosition, bool sendUpdateEvent=false, wxArrayInt *optimizationLineCharPositions=NULL, wxArrayInt *optimizationLineYPositions=NULL, bool isDoCmd=true)
memberdef.name: UpdateAppearance

briefdescription.para: Updates the control appearance, optimizing if possible given information from the call to Layout.
Replaces the buffer paragraphs with the given fragment.
Returns the new fragments.
Returns the old fragments.
Returns the attributes, for single-object commands.
Returns the object to replace the one at the position defined by the container address and the action's range start position.
Sets the object to replace the one at the position defined by the container address and the action's range start position.
Makes an address from the given object.
Calculate arrays for refresh optimization.

Returns the address (nested position) of the container within the buffer being manipulated.

Sets the address (nested position) of the container within the buffer being manipulated.
Returns the container that this action refers to, using the container address and top-level buffer.
Returns the action name.
